3m cushion-mount plus plate mounting tape e1020, white, 27 in x 25 yd (686 mm x 22.86 m), 20 mil (0.5 mm), 1 roll/case

this family of 3m foam mounting tapes provides excellent print quality for process, combination, and solid printing, and offers a complete range of foam densities.
